title: AssemblyNameExtension comparisons fail due to culture confusion
body: On .NET Core, `AssemblyNameExtension.CompareCulture` behaves differently from the full-framework version, and this appears to be causing some test failures, especially in `AssemblyNameEx_Tests.Equals` and `EqualsIgnoreVersion`.  The `baseline` results differ from the comparisons under test when culture is not specified.
